marginalia.translation: The perpetual growth of singular parts.

position.marginalia_text: Quotidiè [--] Qua[nt]um profecere s[--]or horarum [-] alio: quid animo, corpori, fortuna contuleris: quantum hodiè increueris Natura, arte, actione: qua[e] & uiusq[ue] interna[e], externa[e]q[ue] partis auxesis: qua[e] tuaru[m], aut humanaru[m] rerum Multiplicatio? Ta[e]deat plus scribere: pudeat nondu[m] scire necessaria: iuuet omnes supplere defectus: cordi Sit statim lectitare efficacissima, illicò operari vtilissima; confestim omnes Mundi professores, actoresq[ue] superare. Expedit Eudromo: refert Chrysotechni: decet Eutrapelum: oportet Vnicum: conducit Principi: interest Subditi Hoc agere: vrgere Hoc: nunq[uam] cessare, aut morari: Semper pergere proficiendo; proficere pergendo: quotidiè magis, magisq[ue] crescere: nec vllum finem facere augendi Singula bonorum genera: quatenùs ulla potest humana industria. Vnico Artis, Virtutisq[ue] filio, nihil scientiaru[m] aut experimentoru[m] difficile. Salue profice: uale.

marginalia.translation: Daily [...]. To accomplish so much [...]: what you may gather in mind, body, and fortune: today you may grow so much by nature, art and action: [....] the growth of internal and external parts: which are the multiplication or your or human matter? May he be tired to write more: may he be ashamed to not yet know the necessary things: may he help to compensate for all failures. May it be to the heart to repeatedly read the most effective things at once, and to immediately work the most useful things; immediately to surpass all the professors and actors of the world. He frees Eudromus, he goes back to Chrysotechnus, he ougth [to] be Eutrapelus: The unique is proper: it is fitting to a prince, [???] To to this, to press this: never to cease or to delay: alway to proceed to accomplish, always accomplish to proceed: to grow more and more daily: nor to make an end to growth. The singular offspring of good things: so fare as there can be any human industriousness. To the sole son of art and virtue, nothing of the sciences or experiments is difficult. Welcome, accomplish: farewell.
